The claim is supported by an education a: JoEllen Smith, who stated in a newspaper editorial that "Cobb is also one of the largest school systems that is debt free."
The claim is mentioned in a SPLOST advoc: Jay Cunningham and John Loud, who also assert that Cobb County Schools is debt free.
The claim is based on a 2010 census educ: which ranks Cobb County as the 23rd-largest school system in the country.
